trans-unit.source: StorSimple 8000 Series Release Version release notes - July 2014 | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: StorSimple 8000 Series Release Version release notes - July 2014 | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes the new features, issues, and workarounds for the July 2014 Microsoft Azure StorSimple release.
trans-unit.target: Describes the new features, issues, and workarounds for the July 2014 Microsoft Azure StorSimple release.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple 8000 Series Release Version release notes - July 2014
trans-unit.target: StorSimple 8000 Series Release Version release notes - July 2014

trans-unit.source: The follow release notes identify the critical open issues for the StorSimple 8000 Series July 2014 general availability (GA) release of Microsoft Azure StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: The follow release notes identify the critical open issues for the StorSimple 8000 Series July 2014 general availability (GA) release of Microsoft Azure StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: This release corresponds to software version 6.3.9600.17215.
trans-unit.target: This release corresponds to software version 6.3.9600.17215.

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise specified, these release notes apply to all models of the StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Unless otherwise specified, these release notes apply to all models of the StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: The release notes are continuously updated; as critical issues requiring a workaround are discovered, they are added.
trans-unit.target: The release notes are continuously updated; as critical issues requiring a workaround are discovered, they are added.

trans-unit.source: Before you deploy your Microsoft Azure StorSimple solution, consider the following information.
trans-unit.target: Before you deploy your Microsoft Azure StorSimple solution, consider the following information.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides a summary of known issues in this release.
trans-unit.target: The following table provides a summary of known issues in this release.

trans-unit.source: In some instances, when you perform a factory reset, the StorSimple device may be stuck and display this message: **Reset to factory is in progress (phase 8)**.
trans-unit.target: In some instances, when you perform a factory reset, the StorSimple device may be stuck and display this message: **Reset to factory is in progress (phase 8)**.

trans-unit.source: This happens if you press CTRL+C while the cmdlet is in progress.
trans-unit.target: This happens if you press CTRL+C while the cmdlet is in progress.

trans-unit.source: Do not press CTRL+C after initiating a factory reset.
trans-unit.target: Do not press CTRL+C after initiating a factory reset.

trans-unit.source: If you are already in this state, please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: If you are already in this state, please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: In rare instances, if the majority of disks in the EBOD enclosure of an 8600 device are disconnected resulting in no disk quorum, then the storage pool will be offline.
trans-unit.target: In rare instances, if the majority of disks in the EBOD enclosure of an 8600 device are disconnected resulting in no disk quorum, then the storage pool will be offline.

trans-unit.source: It will stay offline even if the disks are reconnected.
trans-unit.target: It will stay offline even if the disks are reconnected.

trans-unit.source: You will need to reboot the device.
trans-unit.target: You will need to reboot the device.

trans-unit.source: If the issue persists, please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: If the issue persists, please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: In rare instances, a cloud snapshot may fail with the error **Maximum backup limit reached**.
trans-unit.target: In rare instances, a cloud snapshot may fail with the error **Maximum backup limit reached**.

trans-unit.source: This occurs if you exceed 255 online clones on the same device, from the same original volume which has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: This occurs if you exceed 255 online clones on the same device, from the same original volume which has been deleted.

trans-unit.source: When a controller replacement is performed, controller 0 may show up as controller 1.
trans-unit.target: When a controller replacement is performed, controller 0 may show up as controller 1.

trans-unit.source: During controller replacement, when the image is loaded from the peer node, the controller ID can show up initially as the peer controller’s ID.
trans-unit.target: During controller replacement, when the image is loaded from the peer node, the controller ID can show up initially as the peer controller’s ID.

trans-unit.source: In rare instances, this behavior may also be seen after a system reboot.
trans-unit.target: In rare instances, this behavior may also be seen after a system reboot.

trans-unit.source: This situation will resolve itself after the controller replacement is complete.
trans-unit.target: This situation will resolve itself after the controller replacement is complete.

trans-unit.source: In the StorSimple Manager service, the device monitoring charts do not work when Basic or NTLM authentication is enabled in the proxy server configuration for the device.
trans-unit.target: In the StorSimple Manager service, the device monitoring charts do not work when Basic or NTLM authentication is enabled in the proxy server configuration for the device.

trans-unit.source: Modify the web proxy configuration for the device registered with your StorSimple Manager service so that authentication is set to NONE.
trans-unit.target: Modify the web proxy configuration for the device registered with your StorSimple Manager service so that authentication is set to NONE.

trans-unit.source: To do this, run the the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple Set-HcsWebProxy cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To do this, run the the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple Set-HcsWebProxy cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: Using the Storage service to delete the storage account is an unsupported scenario.
trans-unit.target: Using the Storage service to delete the storage account is an unsupported scenario.

trans-unit.source: This will lead to a situation in which user data cannot be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: This will lead to a situation in which user data cannot be retrieved.

trans-unit.source: A failback within 24 hours of disaster recovery (DR) is not supported.
trans-unit.target: A failback within 24 hours of disaster recovery (DR) is not supported.

trans-unit.source: Multiple failovers of a volume container from the same source device to different target devices is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Multiple failovers of a volume container from the same source device to different target devices is not supported.

trans-unit.source: Failover from a single dead device to multiple devices will make the volume containers on the first failed over device lose data ownership.
trans-unit.target: Failover from a single dead device to multiple devices will make the volume containers on the first failed over device lose data ownership.

trans-unit.source: After such a failover, these volume containers will appear or behave differently when you view them in the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: After such a failover, these volume containers will appear or behave differently when you view them in the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: During StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint installation, you need to provide a device IP for the install to finish successfully.
trans-unit.target: During StorSimple Adapter for SharePoint installation, you need to provide a device IP for the install to finish successfully.

trans-unit.source: Network interfaces DATA 2 and DATA 3 were swapped in the software.
trans-unit.target: Network interfaces DATA 2 and DATA 3 were swapped in the software.

trans-unit.source: Please contact Microsoft Support if you need to configure these interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Please contact Microsoft Support if you need to configure these interfaces.
